job.title: Sr. RF Design Engineer - Aerospace
job.description: If you are a Sr RF Design Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrDesign Prototyping and Validation of RF Subsystems from concept analysis part selection PCB layout and board bringupbrbrLink budget analysisbrbrPerform simulations using HFSS or AWRADSbrbrElectrical Engineering Embedded Software developmentbrbrIf you have mixedsignal experience in SoftwareDefined Radios this is a huge plusbrbrWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrStrong understanding of RF fundamentalsbrbrPCB layout using Altium or other design softwarebrulli Link Budget Analysislili RF Designlili Circuit Designlili PCB Layoutlili PCB Designlili GPSlili Altiumlili Simulationlili AWRADSlili HFSSbrliulSo if you are a Sr RF Design Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrRichardMarionCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  RM21635332  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulRichard Marion  Recruiting Manager  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
